UTM MOBILITY PROGRAM
====================

by [fadzly](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/fadzly/ "Posts by fadzly")
 | Jul 9, 2024 | [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/450024580_477063874971586_4839240138436506535_n-1080x675.jpg)

One of our students, Siti Farah Farhana Ahmad, Master of Philosophy (Remote Sensing), is attending the summer school in conjunction with IEEE IGARSS in Athens, Greece, as part of our commitment to fostering global learning experiences.
